name: MIZU-MD
description: MIZU-MD has been designed to make things easier and fun while using WhatsApp. 👨‍💻💙🍓

OWNER_NAME.description: Give the name you want the BOT to come to

ALIVE_IMG.description: Give a url of an image to come alive

AUTO_VOICE.description: If you want Auto Voice reply, give true, otherwise give false

AUTO_STICKER.description: If you want auto sticker, give true, otherwise give false

BOTCAHX_API.description: Enter the BOTCAHX_API_KEY available from this site https://api.botcahx.biz.id/signup

ANTILINK_VALUES.description: When antilink is turned on, when this link is added, the user will be removed

READ_MESSAGE.description: If you want to read the bot message, give true, otherwise give false

DISABLE_PM.description: If you want the bot inbox to work, give false, if you don't want it to work, give true

OWNER_NUMBER.description: The phone numbers of the users who you want to be admin for the bot (should be in international format without + and multiple numbers must be separated by a comma ",")

SESSION_ID.description: Enter the code from the QR code scan

WELCOME_MESSAGE.description: Do not change this This can be changed after creating the bot

WORKTYPE.description: Set it to (private) for your own use and set it (to public) for others to use
